sect2.title: Snapshots

row.entry: You can take a snapshot of what is displayed in the center view; this snapshot can then be selected and is overlayed in the current center view to help you with a side by side comparasion (left: snapshot, right: active) when you are tuning parameters of a module. In the active view, history remains usable in order to compare with the snapshot.

sect2.para: You can control the split view by moving the splitline back and forth and if you hover mouse over the split line, a small rotation icon will appear on the center of the line, click it to change to a horizontal split view.
